hero.tagline01: Hire a new talent and save

resume.1: If you've got this far without having made up your mind, then let me introduce myself in a few words. My name is Ronan and I've been accepted into Ironhack's web development program.
resume.2: After living in Colombia for almost 2 years, I'd like to finalize my professional reconversion and get my first job as a Frontend React JS or Fullstack MERN developer under a professionalization contract. I therefore have two short-term objectives: to find a company willing to work with me in order to gain an enriching experience both pedagogically, professionally and humanely; and to obtain a developer certification recognized on the French market, as the one I currently hold is only valid on the Colombian market.
resume.3: That must leave you with a number of questions. I look forward to your call or email, so that we can talk about our future collaboration.
